text:
e="preserve">Mike Walling (8 July 1950 – 2 July 2020) was an English comic actor and screenwriter. He was born in Salford, Lancashire. He was known for his role as Trevor in "Alfonso Bonzo" (1986). He also appeared in "The Smoking Room" and "My Family". He also wrote "Not with a Bang" and "The Brittas Empire".
Walling died on 2 July 2020, six days before his 70th birthday.
